feedback: Provide specific examples of your projects to demonstrate their impact and relevance to potential employers.
Highlight your technical skills beyond just listing them, discuss your level of proficiency and expertise in each area.
Clearly articulate how you can apply your academic background and practical experience to solve real-world problems that align with the role you're seeking.

grading_debug.notes: The speaker demonstrates a strong academic background, practical experience, and technical skills. They could improve by providing more specific examples and articulating the relevance of their projects to potential employers.
